HeadComp.title: Tally Integration - Connect Tally with MSG91
HeadComp.description: Integrate accounting effortlessly with MSG91's Tally integration and connectors for smooth business operations. Connect Tally with MSG91 today.

IntegrationAppComp.heading: Send Invoices on Whatsapp and Email via Tally
IntegrationAppComp.subheading: Automate your financial processes effortlessly with Tally. Streamline invoicing, effortlessly share ledgers, and efficiently recover outstanding amounts, all within the Tally platform.

content: Share ledgers on Whatsapp and recover dues

offers.heading: The MSG91 Tally Prime Plugin Offers
content: Effortless Voucher Resending via. Email or WhatsApp
Send In-Depth Outstanding Balance and Ledger Details

supercharge.content: Supercharge your Tally Prime experience with the MSG91 Tally Prime Plugin, unlocking unparalleled communication and automation capabilities. Save time, enhance communication, and gain precise control over financial transactions for streamlined invoicing and ledger management today.
